peerDependencies.@alanscodelog/semantic-release-config: The commitlint types are extracted right from my semantic release config which is set as a peer dependency just in case the types change in a future version. This way the types will always match 100% with the types in the version of the config the project is using.

scripts.lint:commits: The --from gets the last pushed commit, i.e. origin/branchname, so that commitlint doesn't lint old commits. If it happens to fail because the branch was never pushed, commitlint just lints all the commits anyways.
